job.title: Machine Learning Data Engineer
job.industry: Staffing and Recruiting,Information Technology and Services
job.description: <p><strong>***100% REMOTE***</strong></p><p><br></p><p>We're looking for a Machine Learning Data Engineer with an affinity for machine learning infrastructure and model development. Excellent opportunity to work for a leading eCommerce organization in a role with full remote flexibility!</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities of the Machine Learning Data Engineer:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Prototype and research ML features</li><li>Drive ML solutions in Spark and Tensorflow to production</li><li>Present and communicate internally and externally</li><li>Participate in continuous improvement of team's engineering processes and infrastructure</li><li>Mentor and coach junior engineers and participate in code and design reviews</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements of the Machine Learning Data Engineer:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Demonstrated ability to analyze large data sets and identify gaps</li><li>Ability to design and deploy solutions in a Hadoop environment</li><li>Proficiency in Java and Linux environments</li><li>Basic ML knowledge</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Keywords: Data Engineer, Machine Learning, ML, Spark, Tensorflow, eCommerce, 100% Remote</p><p><br></p><p>Job ID: 352986</p>
